Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the snake waprin family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium, Bacillus anthracis, Staphylococcus warneri.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Omwaprin is closest in structure to the 50 amino acid residue C-terminal WAP domain of the human protein secretory leukocyte protease inhibitor (SLPI) (PDB ID: 2Z7F). This domain of SLPI has eight Cys residues that align well with the Cys residues of omwaprin, suggesting a similar fold.
Sequence Information.Function: Damages membranes of susceptible bacteria. Has antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria. Has no antibacterial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of omwaprin, a new member of the waprin family of snake venom proteins.
Literature.Author: Nair DG, Fry BG, Alewood P, Kumar PP, Kini RM.

Literature.Title: Determination of the X-ray structure of the snake venom protein omwaprin by total chemical synthesis and racemic protein crystallography.
Literature.Author: Banigan JR, Mandal K, Sawaya MR, Thammavongsa V, Hendrickx AP, Schneewind O, Yeates TO, Kent SB.
